title: Tovolo Stainless Steel Handled Mini Turner Tongs With Wide Silicone Tips & Silicone Grips on Handles, Non-Stick & Heat-Resistant Silicone, BPA-Free & Dishwasher-Safe
features: COMPACT TONGS HANDLE BIG JOBS: These tongs may be mini, but they provide the grip, strength, and versatility of a full-size set. Their small size uniquely suits them for small hands, so kids can help with breakfast, lunch or dinner.

PULL RING LOCKS ARMS IN PLACE: Keep the tongs closed with the handy locking mechanism. Pull the ring to lock the tongs in the closed position and push it in to release the arms. Locking mechanism ensure that tongs fit neatly in drawers.

NON-SLIP SILICONE GRIPS: Non-slip silicone provides grip. Soft-touch silicone feels comfortable in hand and prevents accidental slips due to steaming foods or splatters of oil. The soft-touch silicone will not scratch cast iron or nonstick cookware.

DURABLE SILICONE HEADS: BPA-free silicone tips are scratch-resistant, stain-resistant and food-safe to create the best possible kitchen tool. Silicone is heat resistant up to 600 degrees Fahrenheit, so it can withstand the stove, oven or grill.
DIMENSIONS & CARE: 8.25" L X 1" W X 1.25" H; dishwasher safe for easy clean-up.
description: As the cliché goes, these tongs may be small, but they are mighty. Whether you’re serving up hot dogs at a cookout or turning a beautiful cut of meat in a nonstick pan or cast iron skillet, Tovolo’s Mini Silicone Tongs are the perfect tool for the job. The silicone head gently grips food while the non-slip grip handle makes it easy to serve up your favorite foods. Their small size uniquely suits them for small jobs or small hands—teach kids how to pull toast out of the toaster without burning their fingers, or use the mini tongs for cooking vegetables or ground meat in a small pan. Strips of non-slip silicone provide easy grip for turning and handling food. Soft-touch silicone feels comfortable in hand, and prevents accidental slips due to steaming foods or splatters of oil. The added grip also makes serving your favorite dishes a breeze, whether you use them for pasta, grilled chicken, steak, stir-fry, fried foods, barbeque, tofu, or salad. Keep the tongs closed between uses with the handy locking mechanism. Pull the ring to lock the pincers in the closed position, and push it in to release the arms. Locking mechanism makes these tongs compact and easy to use, as they can fit neatly in drawers or on spoon rests between uses, then be ready for action in a flash. BPA-free silicone tips are scratch-resistant, stain-resistant, and food-safe to create the best possible kitchen tool. The soft-touch silicone will not scratch pans, making it a gentle and safe choice for nonstick bakeware or cast iron cookware. Silicone is heat resistant up to 600 degrees Fahrenheit, so it can flip, turn, and stir all your favorite foods on the stovetop, fresh out of the oven, or on the grill.
